zeroconf_confirm.title: Confirm Crestron device
zeroconf_confirm.description: Do you want to add the Crestron device at {host} to Home Assistant?

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Crestron
reauth_confirm.description: Your Crestron credentials for {host} have become invalid. Please enter a new authentication token.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the hub. Please check the host and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication token. Please check and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Crestron hub is already configured.

auth_failure.title: Crestron Authentication Error
auth_failure.description: The authentication token for your Crestron hub at {host} is no longer valid. Please update your credentials.

init.title: Fix Authentication Issue
init.description: The Crestron integration is having {issue} issues. Do you want to reconfigure your authentication credentials?

confirm.title: Reconfigure Authentication
confirm.description: We'll guide you through the process of updating your {integration_name} authentication credentials.

connectivity.title: Crestron Connectivity Error
connectivity.description: The Crestron hub at {host} cannot be reached. Please check that the device is powered on and connected to your network.

init.title: Fix Connectivity Issue
init.description: The Crestron integration is having {issue} issues. Do you want to try reconnecting?

confirm.title: Reconnect
confirm.description: We'll attempt to reconnect to your {integration_name} hub. Make sure the device is powered on and connected to your network.

stale_shades.title: Crestron Stale Shade Data
stale_shades.description: The shades data from your Crestron hub at {host} is stale. Typically this means the hub has been rebooted or is experiencing issues.

init.title: Fix Stale Data Issue
init.description: The Crestron integration is having {issue} issues. Do you want to try refreshing the data?

confirm.title: Refresh Data
confirm.description: We'll attempt to refresh the data from your {integration_name} hub. This will reload the integration.
